name: Pixel Time Travel
description:
Pixel Time Travel!

You are a scientist working on a high-tech lab by fixing some portal when suddenly you get stuck in a time loop, now you have to catch some metal nuts in order to advance to each portal. 

This endless runner game was made with the point of showing each pixel art generation throughout the years, showcasing the 1 bit, 3 bits, 8 bits, 16 bit and one generation that I called modern era, the one we are right now. 

This project was made to assist my thesis about Pixel Art Visual Representation. 

-

-

-

Controls

Arrows :

up or space (jump)

down (crouch)

left & right (moving to another generation)

The side arrows work as a hot key to showcase all the generations, they aren't mean to be used in gameplay. Only to easy view of all the Levels.
